mapper.select: select qmbbid as bbid from jcpd_bbkzb where bbid in(select distinct bbid from jcpd_lkdczb union select distinct bbid from jcpd_lmjcb union select distinct bbid from jcpd_lkpdmxb) and qmbbid=#{bbid}

select qm.*,nvl(lm1.zhi,100) as rqi,lm1.pjz as iri,nvl(lm2.zhi,100) as rdi, nvl(lm3.zhi,100) as sri,nvl(lm4.zhi,100) as pssi from jcpd_qmldb qm left join (select * from jcpd_lmjcb where bbid=#{jcbbid} and jclx='0401')lm1 on qm.ldid=lm1.ldid left join (select * from jcpd_lmjcb where bbid=#{jcbbid} and jclx='0402')lm2 on qm.ldid=lm2.ldid left join (select * from jcpd_lmjcb where bbid=#{jcbbid} and jclx='0403')lm3 on qm.ldid=lm3.ldid left join (select * from jcpd_lmjcb where bbid=#{jcbbid} and jclx='0404')lm4 on qm.ldid=lm4.ldid where qm.lxcode=#{lxCode} and qm.szhh>=#{szhh} and #{ezhh}>qm.szhh and qm.bbid=(select qmbbid from jcpd_bbkzb where bbid=#{jcbbid})

select round(nvl(100-#{a0}*power(100*sum(qz*ljsj*dwkf)/(#{cd}*#{lmkd}),#{a1}),100),2) as pci from (select nvl(l.ljsj,0) ljsj,lx.qz,lx.dwkf,lx.lxname from jcpd_lkdcfb l left join jcpd_lkdclxb lx on l.lxid=lx.lxid where dcid=(select dcid from jcpd_lkdczb where ldid=#{ldid} and bbid=#{dcbbid} and lxid=#{lxid}))

select nvl(sum(qz*fn_checknum(100-total)),100) as sci from (select lxName,sum(ljsj*dwkf) as total,avg(qz) as qz from (select nvl(l.ljsj,0) ljsj,lx.dwkf,lx.qz,lx.lxname from jcpd_lkdcfb l left join jcpd_lkdclxb lx on l.lxid=lx.lxid where dcid=(select dcid from jcpd_lkdczb where ldid=#{ldid} and bbid=#{dcbbid} and lxid='02')) group by lxName)

select fn_checknum(100-nvl(max(total),0)) as bci from (select lxName,sum(ljsj*dwkf) as total from (select nvl(l.ljsj,0) ljsj,lx.dwkf,lx.lxname from jcpd_lkdcfb l left join jcpd_lkdclxb lx on l.lxid=lx.lxid where dcid=(select dcid from jcpd_lkdczb where ldid=#{ldid} and bbid=#{dcbbid} and lxid='03')) group by lxName)

select round(nvl(sum(qz*fn_checknum(100-total)),100),2) as tci from (select lxName,sum(ljsj*dwkf) as total,avg(qz) as qz from (select nvl(l.ljsj,0) ljsj,lx.dwkf,lx.qz,lx.lxname from jcpd_lkdcfb l left join jcpd_lkdclxb lx on l.lxid=lx.lxid where dcid=(select dcid from jcpd_lkdczb where ldid=#{ldid} and bbid=#{dcbbid} and lxid='04')) group by lxName)

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN,TEMP.* FROM( select t.*,q.lxcode,q.szhh,q.ezhh,q.cd,mj.value as fxName from jcpd_lkpdmxb t join jcpd_qmldb q on t.ldid=q.ldid left join htgl_mjlx mj on q.fx=mj.key where t.bbid=#{pdbbid} and q.lxcode=#{lxCode} and q.szhh>=#{szhh} and #{ezhh}>q.szhh and q.lmlx=#{lmlx} and q.fx = #{fx} and q.isgs=#{isgs} order by q.szhh,q.fx ) TEMP
where ROWNUM <= (#{page} * #{rows}) )
RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (select t.*,q.* from jcpd_lkpdmxb t join jcpd_qmldb q on t.ldid=q.ldid where t.bbid=#{pdbbid} and q.lxcode=#{lxCode} and q.szhh>=#{szhh} and #{ezhh}>q.szhh and q.lmlx=#{lmlx} and q.fx = #{fx} and q.isgs=#{isgs})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM JCPD_LKPDMXB WHERE BBID=#{pdbbid} AND LDID IN (SELECT LDID FROM JCPD_QMLDB WHERE LXCODE=#{lxCode} AND szhh>=#{szhh} and #{ezhh}>szhh AND BBID=(SELECT QMBBID FROM JCPD_BBKZB WHERE BBID=#{pdbbid}) )
mapper.select: select distinct(lmlx) lmlx, case lmlx when 1 then '沥青路面' when 2 then '水泥路面' when 3 then '砂石路面' end fx FROM Jcpd_Qmldb where lxCode=#{lxCode} and (szhh)>=#{szhh} and (ezhh)<=#{ezhh} order by lmlx
select distinct(isgs) lmlx, case isgs when 1 then '高速或一级公路' when 0 then '普通公路' end fx FROM Jcpd_Qmldb where lxcode = #{lxCode} and (szhh)>=#{szhh} and (ezhh)<=#{ezhh} order by lmlx desc

SELECT LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH,SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '龟裂' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ ELSE 0 END)JL, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '块状裂缝' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ ELSE 0 END)KL, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '纵向裂缝' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ WHEN '横向裂缝' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ ELSE 0 END)DTLF, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '沉陷' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ ELSE 0 END)CX, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '波浪拥包' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ ELSE 0 END)BLYB, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '车辙' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ ELSE 0 END)CZ, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '坑槽' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ ELSE 0 END)KC, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '松散' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ ELSE 0 END)SS, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '泛油' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ ELSE 0 END)FY, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '修补' THEN LJSJ*100/LMMJ ELSE 0 END)XB FROM (SELECT LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH,LXNAME,SUM(CD*LMKD) LMMJ,SUM(LJSJ) LJSJ FROM (SELECT BBID,LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH,CD,FX,LMKD,LXNAME,SUM(LJSJ*DWKF*QZ)LJSJ FROM V_LKDC WHERE LXID LIKE '0101%' AND BBID =#{dcbbid} AND LXCODE=#{lxCode} AND SZHH>=#{szhh} AND #{ezhh}>SZHH GROUP BY BBID,LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH,CD,FX,LMKD,LXNAME) GROUP BY LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH,LXNAME) GROUP BY LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH ORDER BY LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH
